New Records: Quinton de Kock was named Player of the Match
South Africa set USA a target of 195 runs
Andries Gous scored 80 runs for the USA
Key Match Events: Corey Anderson's dismissal by Anrich Nortje was a turning point
USA's late-innings surge led by Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh
Pre-Game Insights: USA were making their debut in the T20 World Cup
South Africa were aiming to defend a challenging total
Post-Match Reflections: Aidan Markram praised the team's performance
Aaron Jones acknowledged the USA's effort but highlighted the need for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant for the USA's World Cup debut
Young players like Steven Taylor and Tristan Stubbs showed promise
The win moved South Africa to the top of their group
